text: "Change Your Life" is a 2013 song by Little Mix and is the third single from their first studio album DNA. It went to number 12 in the United Kingdom and Ireland, number 8 in Scotland and Australia and number 29 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Little Mix songs
title: Change Your Life (Little Mix song)
